snippet: An argument over the teachings of the philosopher Immanuel Kant ended when one man shot another with a gun loaded with rubber bullets, the state RIA news agency reported.
abstract: Argument over the teachings of philosopher Immanuel Kant between two men standing in line for beer at an outdoor festival in southern Russia ends when one man shoots the other in the head with a gun loaded with rubber bullets.
lead_paragraph: An argument over the teachings of the philosopher Immanuel Kant ended when one man shot another with a gun loaded with rubber bullets, the state RIA news agency reported.
